p: Liver injury was distinguished by many tests as the identification of ALT, ALP, bilirubin and AST levels [ 5]. Each test has its own indication, for example, high level of AST suggests that there is a loss of functional integrity in the liver, similar to the actions observed in muscle injury, cardiac infraction and viral hepatitis. ALT is a liver enzyme, that catalyzes the conversion of alanine to pyruvate and glutamate, it can detect liver damage [ 6].
